comments.author: lolage.1450
comments.body:
Had a brief look at the API and didn’t see anything there; could be a useful addition.

With regard to the sentry information I’m looking for or asking about is when it scouts enemy players. Currently on our maps we are able to see a lot of orange dot positions and movements, any plans to make this available in the API? I understand that this probably isn’t there for at least two reasons: 1) potentially unfair, 2) it’s more or less real-time data and would result in thrashing the API servers. Can’t hurt to ask though :]

I ask about damage/supply/siege information as it might be useful in terms of knowing how crucial it is for a float team to change map in order to defend valuable assets, rather than relying on bad scout reports in teamchat.

Anything else you guys can think of that’d be cool to be able to scrape about live matchups?
